descriptionHtml:
Isran once scoffed at the idea of a simple woodcutter's axe being his future recruit Agmaer's weapon of choice. An axe that belonged to Agmaer's pa no less. Little did Isran know, "My Pa's Axe" is no ordinary woodcutter's tool, it is a lethal instrument of death.

This mod is very straightforward. It adds a unique woodcutter's axe called "My Pa's Axe" to the game. It appears in Agmear's inventory as you approach Fort Dawnguard. It also appears on a barrel on the first floor of Fort Dawnguard, in the set of rooms immediately to the left of the entrance. It can be upgraded at a grindstone, and is not affected by any smithing perks.

This is my first mod, so be gentle in your criticism. I am no modder, so it doesn't use any fancy new models or textures. Don't expect anything balanced either. It is overpowered, but definitely not a god item by my standards (my standards aren't really high though, so consider that). Also, this mod was made for shits 'n' Giggs, so I won't take anything seriously if you comment about it. In fact, ignore the first sentence of this paragraph and just lay it on me.

With that said, enjoy it if you download the mod, if you don't I can't blame you.
author: Kuboxxl
